parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description: The maximum bandwidth for the EIP. This value cannot be larger than the maximum bandwidth of the Internet Shared Bandwidth instance. Unit: Mbit/s.

parameters.name: BandwidthPackageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

parameters.name: EipId
parameters.description: The ID of the EIP that is associated with the Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Internet Shared Bandwidth instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
